title: BRIEF-India's ACC Sept-Qtr Consol Profit Rises
text:
BRIEF-India's ACC Sept-Qtr Consol Profit Rises

Stock Markets 21 minutes ago (Oct 15, 2019 17:40)

© Reuters. BRIEF-India's ACC Sept-Qtr Consol Profit Rises Oct 15 (Reuters) - ACC Ltd : * SEPT QUARTER CONSOL PROFIT 3.03 BILLION RUPEES VERSUS PROFIT OF 2.09 BILLION RUPEES LAST YEAR * CONSENSUS FORECAST FOR SEPT QUARTER PROFIT WAS 2.89 BILLION RUPEES * SEPT QUARTER CONSOL REVENUE FROM OPERATIONS 35.28 BILLION RUPEES VERSUS 34.33 BILLION RUPEES LAST YEAR

BRIEF-India's ACC Sept-Qtr Consol Profit Rises
description: BRIEF-India's ACC Sept-Qtr Consol Profit Rises
